user.title: Comet WiFi Thermostat
user.description:
Set up your Comet WiFi thermostats.

**Instructions:**
1. Ensure your thermostats are connected to your Wi-Fi network.
2. Use the official Eurotronic app or refer to the thermostat's documentation to obtain your MQTT username and password.
3. Enter the MQTT broker details below.

data.mqtt_bridge: Enable MQTT Bridging (Maintain Official App Functionality)

error.cannot_connect: Cannot connect to the MQTT broker.
